name: 80's Mania Pinball
description:
Throwback to the golden age of arcade with this incredible pinball machine.
Simple, funny and hard to dominate.

Features:

  • Multiball
  • Extraball
  • Jackpot
  • Original soundtrack
  • Portrait and landscape mode
  • Highscore
  • Realistic physics

Developer note's
Voodoo Doll is a one man studio and this is my first pinball game.
Hope you enjoy.
Your opinion on the game is very important for us, if possible, review us!
This way, we will find what can be improved and it helps a lot by promoting the game.

Thanx so much

Alexandre Laredo
